snippet.title: Mystery of Melody Memorial Release Trailer
snippet.description:
The stage is set, and the curtains have arisen! Mystery of Melody Memorial is a rhythm adventure game where you follow the journey of homeless bear Joseph and local celebrity Angeli as they traverse colorful locales and interact with quirky characters! Puzzles and perils await at every turn, and they'll have to face the music to uncover secrets so untold.

Are you ready to believe?

Buy on Steam here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/804230/Mystery_of_Melody_Memorial/

Buy on Itch.io here:
https://ryan-silberman.itch.io/

Follow the game on Twitter here:
https://twitter.com/melody_memorial

Read an interview with the game's creator here:
https://gamingreinvented.com/interview/lets-interview-mystery-of-melody-memorial-creator-ryansil/

Join the game's Discord server here:
https://discord.gg/DYewjXdErA"
